html:
And upon all the cedars of Lebanon, that are high and lifted up, and upon all the oaks of Bashan, (Isaiah 2:13.)

Yea, and the day of the Lord shall come upon all the cedars of Lebanon, for they are high and lifted up; and upon all the oaks of Bashan; (2 Ne. 12:13.)

The Book of Mormon retention of the phrase "Yea, and the day of the Lord shall come" replaces the introductory "and" in the KJV, further verifying the time period.
